data.actual_result: when you open the channel, you will read the first message and has new message notification at the top of the chat field
data.expected_result: when you open the channel, you will read the latest message
data.short_description: New obtained channel after obtaining a role jumped you to the first message (Part of ping bug in android)
data.steps_to_repro: - Be sure that you are using android and have stuck red ping badge in a channel that has role permission.  - Remove the role from your android device using a bot command and terminate your discord for android client - Open your discord desktop client. - get the role from a bot command - open the channel that you got with the role.
